p: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of movement speed when passing them.
q: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.
w: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.
e: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.
r: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.
